Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Sun's Song#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: I've heard Ganon dislikes lemon-flavored popsicles.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #2# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that Flare Dancers do not fear Goron-crafted blades.
